00049 int CMainFrame::OnCreate(LPCREATESTRUCT lpCreateStruct)
00050 {
00051         if (CFrameWnd::OnCreate(lpCreateStruct) == -1)
00052                 return -1;
00053         
00054         if (!m_wndToolBar.CreateEx(this, TBSTYLE_FLAT, WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE | CBRS_TOP
00055                 | CBRS_GRIPPER | CBRS_TOOLTIPS | CBRS_FLYBY | CBRS_SIZE_DYNAMIC) ||
00056                 !m_wndToolBar.LoadToolBar(IDR_MAINFRAME))
00057         {
00058                 TRACE0("Failed to create toolbar\n");
00059                 return -1;      // fail to create
00060         }
00061 
00062         if (!m_wndStatusBar.Create(this) ||
00063                 !m_wndStatusBar.SetIndicators(indicators,
00064                   sizeof(indicators)/sizeof(UINT)))
00065         {
00066                 TRACE0("Failed to create status bar\n");
00067                 return -1;      // fail to create
00068         }
00069 
00070         // TODO: Delete these three lines if you don't want the toolbar to
00071         //  be dockable
00072         m_wndToolBar.EnableDocking(CBRS_ALIGN_ANY);
00073         EnableDocking(CBRS_ALIGN_ANY);
00074         DockControlBar(&m_wndToolBar);
00075 
00076         return 0;
00077 }
